summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding alerts related to individuals Darren Indyke and Richard Kahn, who are associated with Deutsche Bank. The alerts were cleared by AML Compliance after confirming that they were false positives, providing details about their identities and roles.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is the sender of the email, requesting the clearance of alerts related to Darren Indyke and Richard Kahn.

persons.name: Renee Salhi
persons.context: Renee Salhi is the recipient of the email who confirms the clearance of the alerts from an AML perspective.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is mentioned as having a PCR alert but is cleared from any issues by AML Compliance.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned in relation to multiple alerts and is confirmed to be a false positive due to a different date of birth.

connections.description: Cynthia Rodriguez and Renee Salhi are both associated with Deutsche Bank, with Cynthia reaching out to Renee for compliance matters.
Darren Indyke is a client of Deutsche Bank, and Cynthia Rodriguez is involved in the compliance review of his alerts.
Richard Kahn is also a client of Deutsche Bank, and Cynthia Rodriguez is addressing alerts related to him.

keyFacts: Darren Indyke is a beneficiary of the Butterfly Trust and has a date of birth of 2/19/1965.
Richard Kahn has multiple alerts against him, including disciplinary actions and a sex offender list, but is confirmed to be a false positive.
Cynthia Rodriguez is requesting the clearance of alerts for both Darren Indyke and Richard Kahn.
The alerts were cleared by AML Compliance after confirming the identities of the individuals.
Cynthia Rodriguez works for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
